article.description: Donte Wright scored 20 points, Janai Rayner-Powell scored 18 and got a crucial steal, and South Carolina State slipped past Howard for a 91-88 overtime victory Saturday.
article.headline: South Carolina State edges Howard 91-88 in OT
article.linkText: South Carolina State edges Howard 91-88 in OT
article.story: ORANGEBURG, S.C. -- Donte Wright scored 20 points, Janai Rayner-Powell scored 18 and got a crucial steal, and South Carolina State slipped past Howard for a 91-88 overtime victory Saturday. A pair of free throws from Wright with 41 seconds left in overtime gave South Carolina State the lead for good, 89-88, and then Rayner-Powell got a steal, drew the foul and went 2 for 2 from the line to stretch the advantage to three. Howard's Charles Williams missed a 3-pointer at the other end and Ozante Fields hauled in the defensive rebound with eight second left to seal it. The Bulldogs trailed by 12 at halftime but overtook Howard with 18-for-30 shooting in the second half. Wright finished 9 of 10 from the line, Damani Applewhite had 17 points and James Richardson got 12 for South Carolina State (6-12, 2-1 Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference). Howard (3-16, 0-3) forced overtime with a bucket from Kyle Foster with 33 seconds left in regulation to tie the game at 76. Williams finished with 28 points, R.J. Cole added 27 and Cameron Lewis had 10 for Howard, which shot 54 percent from the field.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
